attributes.name: element-loading-text
attributes.desc: loading text that displays under the spinner

attributes.name: element-loading-svg
attributes.desc: icon of the custom spinner (same as element-loading-spinner)

attributes.name: element-loading-svg-view-box
attributes.desc: sets the viewBox attribute for loading svg element

options.name: target
options.desc: the DOM node Loading needs to cover. Accepts a DOM object or a string. If it's a string, it will be passed to document.querySelector to get the corresponding DOM node

options.name: body
options.desc: same as the body modifier of v-loading

options.name: fullscreen
options.desc: same as the fullscreen modifier of v-loading

options.name: lock
options.desc: same as the lock modifier of v-loading

options.name: text
options.desc: loading text that displays under the spinner

options.name: spinner
options.desc: class name of the custom spinner

options.name: svg
options.desc: custom SVG element to override the default loading spinner

options.name: svgViewBox
options.desc: sets the viewBox attribute for loading svg element

options.name: beforeClose ^(2.7.8)
options.desc: Function executed before loading attempts to close. If this function returns false, the closing process will be aborted. Otherwise, the loading will close.

options.name: closed ^(2.7.8)
options.desc: Function triggered after loading has completely closed
